content: i don t mind if you sell finished products from the pattern as long as you credit back for the design either by tagging me in your social media posts or linking back to the pattern directly please do not sell or reproduce the pattern itself happy hooking **blog ** https //geekyhooker com/ **instagram ** @geekyhooker 2 **twitter ** @geekyhooker 1 **facebook ** https //www facebook com/geekyhooker/ 1 https //twitter com/geekyhooker 2 https //www instagram com/geekyhooker/ **5/24/18 update ** made a few revisions to the pattern pattern itself is still the same just reworded a few things that will hopefully make it clearer * added a note in the beginning that the pattern is to be done in a continuous spiral unless otherwise noted this was previously written on the ravelry listing but not in the pattern itself * included specific colors in the final stitch count of each round * revised the wording for how to make the feet hope all that helps
